articles.author: James Mackenzie, Maya Gebeily
articles.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Israeli airstrikes had killed two successors to Hezbollah's slain leader.
articles.title: Hezbollah targets Israeli troops on Lebanese border, sirens in Beirut

articles.author: Jarrett Renshaw
articles.description: The battle for Erie County, which has voted with the winning presidential candidate for the last four elections, demonstrates the urgency of identifying and contacting individual voters in a campaign that remains stubbornly close.
articles.title: This Pennsylvania county picks presidents. How the Harris vs. Trump fight is going.

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: At least 45 people were killed in Israeli military strikes on Gaza in the past 24 hours, Palestinian medics said on Wednesday, as Israeli forces pressed on with a raid on the Jabalia refugee camp in the enclave's north.
articles.title: Israel carries out new strikes in Gaza, UN chief says many trapped in north

articles.author: Trevor Hunnicutt, Maayan Lubell, Matt Spetalnick
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden spoke by phone with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday and the two leaders were expected to discuss Israeli plans for a retaliatory strike on Iran.
articles.title: Biden, Netanyahu speak on Israel plans for retaliation against Iran

articles.author: Abdelaziz Boumzar, Heba Fouad
articles.description: Nearly 2,000 Turkish citizens and family members prepared to leave Beirut on two Turkish navy landing ships on Wednesday, evacuating from Lebanon over fears for their safety as Israel expanded its operations against Hezbollah militants.
articles.title: Turks set to evacuate from Lebanon by ship, driven by safety fears

articles.author: Greg Torode
articles.description: From a missile discreetly ferried more than 1,000 km (620 miles) to a launch site, to the use of remote bases and satellites to track it from Hainan Island to the South Pacific, China's September ICBM flight marked a test of operational necessity.
articles.title: Beyond the politics, China's missile test reflects military need

articles.author: Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard
articles.description: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te will say in his national day speech on Thursday that China has been using every possible means to cause "chaos", according to an outline of the speech, as the island reported more Chinese warplanes in the run-up.
articles.title: Taiwan president to say China has been causing 'chaos' in keynote address

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The chief minister of Pakistan's most populous province called for "climate diplomacy" with neighbour and arch-rival India to combat smog ahead of the winter months, which are accompanied by dangerous levels of pollution in both nations.
articles.title: Head of Pakistan's Punjab calls for diplomacy with India to tackle smog

articles.author: Parisa Hafezi, Andrew Mills
articles.description: The comments come as Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi heads to Saudi Arabia and other Gulf states for talks.
articles.title: Exclusive: Gulf states must not allow use of airspace against Iran, Iranian official says

articles.author: Joanna Plucinska, Mohammad Yunus Yawar
articles.description: The new rerouting shows the difficult calculus airlines are forced to make.
articles.title: More airlines fly over Afghanistan in last week as Middle East tensions rise
